data.actual_result: Window controls are non-functional unless the client is the active window
data.expected_result: Window controls should be actionable even if Discord is not the active window (this is the behavior with other programs--tested and verified with the Safari window controls)
data.short_description: [macOS Specific] Window control buttons (close, minimize, full screen) are not actionable when Discord is behind another window
data.steps_to_repro: - Run Discord in windowed mode - Prioritize another window and leave the Discord window controls visible - Attempt to use Discord's window controls while Discord is not the actively selected program
